Selected Publications

( * refers to the students I have advised or co-advised, indicates the corresponding author)

  1. TON
    Concurrent Charging With Wave Interference for Multiple Chargers
    Tang Liu, Yuzhuo Ma, Meixuan Ren, Jin Yang, Jian Peng, Jilin Yang, Dié Wu
    IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking (TON), 2024.
    PDF BibTex Early Access

  2. TMC
    Utilizing the neglected back lobe for directional charging scheduling
    Tang Liu, Meixuan Ren, Dié Wu, Jing Xue, Jingwen Li, Sun Mao, Wenzheng Xu
    IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC), 2024.
    PDF BibTex

  3. PRCAI
    Approximate Supplement-Based Neighborhood Rough Set Model in Incomplete Hybrid Information Systems
    Xiong Meng*, Jilin Yang, Dié Wu, Tang Liu
    Pacific Rim International Conference on Artificial Intelligence (PRICAI), 2023.
    PDF BibTex

  4. TOSN
    Practical charger placement scheme for wireless rechargeable sensor networks with obstacles
    Wei You*, Meixuan Ren, Yuzhuo Ma, Dié Wu, Jilin Yang, Xuxun Liu, Tang Liu
    ACM Transactions on Sensor Networks (TOSN), 2023.
    PDF BibTex

  5. INFOCOM
    Utilizing the neglected back lobe for mobile charging
    Meixuan Ren*, Dié Wu, Jing Xue, Wenzheng Xu, Jian Peng, Tang Liu
    IEEE Conference on Computer Communications (INFOCOM), 2023.
    PDF BibTex

  6. INFOCOM
    Concurrent charging with wave interference
    Yuzhuo Ma*, Dié Wu, Meixuan Ren, Jian Peng, Jilin Yang, Tang Liu
